P001.name: Town Crier Jessa
P001.desc_en: Jessa stands atop a low crate in the square, ringing a handbell as she calls out news of incoming ships, unexplained bloodstains, and the mayor's increasingly desperate decrees.
P001.desc_zh: 报信人立箱摇铃，宣告来船与血迹之事，政令与流言并传。

P002.name: Street Performer Jorin
P002.desc_en: Jorin juggles knives and colored stones for gathered onlookers. Quick with a joke and quicker with his hands, he hears rumors before most anyone else.
P002.desc_zh: 街头艺人乔林抛刀弄石，笑语连珠；耳听八方，最先得闻传闻。

P003.name: Fishmonger Talo
P003.desc_en: Talo's stall overflows with the day's catch laid over crushed ice. He knows every captain on the docks and the gossip that rides in with their ships.
P003.desc_zh: 鱼贩摊前冰鲜满布，识尽船长往来，海上传言尽入其耳。

P004.name: Spice Seller Nima
P004.desc_en: Nima sells jars of pungent spices and dried peppers from distant ports. Her keen nose and sharper memory make her a quiet observer of who buys what and why.
P004.desc_zh: 香料商妮玛售远港辛物，记忆敏锐，洞察谁买何物。

P005.name: Cleric Serah
P005.desc_en: Serah, a middle-aged cleric of the sea goddess, tends to sailors and townsfolk alike. She listens more than she speaks and keeps a careful eye on omens from the harbor—and on the strange emptiness in the eyes of those who wake up with blood on their doorsteps.
P005.desc_zh: 海之女神的司祭塞拉寡言慎行，照拂众人；尤留意血迹与失忆之兆。

P006.name: Novice Arel
P006.desc_en: Arel is a young acolyte sweeping stone floors and lighting candles. Nervous but earnest, they have seen more than Serah realizes and struggle with what to share.
P006.desc_zh: 年轻侍者阿雷尔扫地燃烛，见闻甚多却欲言又止。

P007.name: Mitch
P007.desc_en: Mitch is a broad-shouldered lumberjack with calloused hands and haunted eyes. He insists he just wants someone to uncover the truth behind the bloodstains, but his agitation cuts a little too deep.
P007.desc_zh: 魁梧伐木者米奇神色惶然，求查血案真相，情绪难平。

P008.name: Mayor Elric
P008.desc_en: Mayor Elric is a tired man in a well-kept coat, juggling merchants' demands and the growing panic over unexplained bloodstains.
P008.desc_zh: 市长埃尔里克衣着考究，周旋诸务，维持城镇秩序却心力交瘁。

P009.name: Scribe Loth
P009.desc_en: Loth is a meticulous scribe surrounded by inkpots and scrolls. He files complaints, tallies taxes, and occasionally buries inconvenient paperwork for the right favor.
P009.desc_zh: 书记官洛斯执笔如山，既记税务亦藏隐情。

P010.name: Gate Guard Ren
P010.desc_en: Ren leans on his spear at the harbor gate, sizing up everyone who passes. He's seen enough trouble to be wary, but a kind word or shared drink can loosen his tongue.
P010.desc_zh: 港门守卫伦持矛观人，谨慎寡言，酒后或吐真言。

P011.name: Dockmaster Hara
P011.desc_en: Hara keeps a ledger tucked under one arm as she strides up and down the docks. She knows which ships arrived late, which cargo went missing, and which captains owe favors.
P011.desc_zh: 码头管事哈拉账本在手，船期货物人情概无一疏。

P012.name: Deckhand Finn
P012.desc_en: Finn is a young deckhand with rope-burned hands and boundless curiosity. He listens in on sailor gossip and can point out trouble brewing on the piers.
P012.desc_zh: 年轻水手芬恩手上有绳灼痕，好奇多问，常闻码头秘事。

P013.name: Foreman Kesh
P013.desc_en: Kesh oversees the loading crews with a barked order and a sharp eye. He insists everything is above board, but his ledgers don't always match what moves in the night.
P013.desc_zh: 工头凯什指挥如雷，账目却暗藏疑云。

P014.name: Smuggler Lia
P014.desc_en: Lia moves quietly through the shadows beneath the warehouses. She trades in information as much as contraband and always seems to know who's asking too many questions.
P014.desc_zh: 走私者莉娅，行迹隐秘之女，消息与违禁之物皆可交易。

P015.name: Old Tellan
P015.desc_en: Tellan sits on the well's rim spinning stories for anyone who will listen. Some tales are harmless gossip, others hint at things buried under the town.
P015.desc_zh: 老特兰井边说书，故事中暗藏地下之秘。

P016.name: Captain Varr
P016.desc_en: Captain Varr is a broad-shouldered veteran with a scar along his jaw. He takes the town's safety personally and has little patience for fools, but respects those who pull their weight.
P016.desc_zh: 守卫队长瓦尔肩宽下颌有疤，铁面无私，誓守城镇安危。

P017.name: Street Urchin Pip
P017.desc_en: Pip is a sharp-eyed child who knows every shortcut and loose shutter in the alleyways.
P017.desc_zh: 街头小鬼皮普眼尖机灵，熟知暗巷捷径与松动的窗栓。

P018.name: Fence Caris
P018.desc_en: Caris leans in the shadows near a back door, dealing in small stolen goods and no questions asked.
P018.desc_zh: 销赃者卡里斯倚，阴影中人，专收赃物、不问来历。

P019.name: Cook Brenna
P019.desc_en: Brenna is the Copper Cup's harried cook, always juggling pots and shouting orders through the kitchen door.
P019.desc_zh: 厨娘布伦娜忙于锅灶，却耳听八方。

P020.name: Caretaker Ilya
P020.desc_en: Ilya quietly cleans the old shrine and replaces wilted offerings. She claims to have seen strange lights near the well on stormy nights.
P020.desc_zh: 看守人伊莉娅打扫古祠、更换供物，曾见井旁异光。

P021.name: Bridge Watcher Sol
P021.desc_en: Sol leans on the bridge railing during most evening watches, counting lanterns and noting who comes and goes along the river path.
P021.desc_zh: 桥卫索尔夜里倚栏数灯，记录来往之人。

P022.name: Boatman Jaro
P022.desc_en: Jaro tends a small skiff tied to a worn post. For the right price, he'll ferry people quietly along the river—or look the other way when others do.
P022.desc_zh: 船夫贾罗看着系在旧桩上的小艇，见钱行事，善于装作不知。

P023.name: Fisher Rian
P023.desc_en: Rian mends nets on an upturned crate outside his shack, grumbling about changing tides and strange catches pulled from deeper waters.
P023.desc_zh: 补网渔夫里安抱怨潮汐怪异。

P024.name: Fisher Mira
P024.desc_en: Mira cleans fish with quick, practiced motions, humming an old sea-song under her breath.
P024.desc_zh: 渔妇米拉手法娴熟地剖鱼，低声哼着古老海歌，也承认偶尔醒来靴子湿透却不知缘由。

P025.name: Town Wizard Arlen
P025.desc_en: Arlen is a reclusive wizard who seldom leaves his guarded home. Whispers say he can pluck souls back from the brink and smooth away memories like ink from parchment.
P025.desc_zh: 镇法师阿伦深居简出，传言能改记忆、追魂魄。

P026.name: Mara
P026.desc_en: The proprietor. Married to Brin. Her wedding anniversary is April 15th. Brisk, perceptive, and inclined to help if treated respectfully.
P026.desc_zh: 酒馆老板娘玛拉，嫁与布林；精明干练，若被尊重则愿帮忙。结婚纪念日四月十五。

P027.name: Brin
P027.desc_en: Mara's husband. A weather-beaten sailor with a limp. Forgetful of his wedding anniversary date.
P027.desc_zh: 玛拉之夫布林，跛足水手饱经风霜，常忘纪念日。

P028.name: Edda
P028.desc_en: A scholar cataloging tavern legends, forever scribbling into a leather folio.
P028.desc_zh: 学者埃达酒馆记传说不辍。

P029.name: Thom
P029.desc_en: An off-duty guard who prefers order and dislikes surprises upstairs.
P029.desc_zh: 休班守卫托姆喜秩序，讨厌楼上的意外发生。

P030.name: Lysa
P030.desc_en: A traveling bard tuning a battered lute, eager for new tales.
P030.desc_zh: 游吟诗人莱莎调琴，渴望新故事。
